column4: is there anyway to run unity without the silly side bar thingy
i like the screen space i get from the window manager
but the side bar is big and pointless
id much rather use docky or something
its resizable in natty.  but thats #ubuntu+1
yes but my netbook is not wide enough and the sidebar is taking up too much space
you can select regular gnome at the login screen
this is 10.10 netbook right?
gnome takes up too much space at the top
so remove a panel
yes on a netbook
I use 10.10 regular on a dell mini9
but the window manager doesn't become part of the top
unity in natty is lot better, and usable on a 9" screen
maybe there is a backport of it?
for now, choose classic desktop at the login screen, remove a panel and add your dock
not sure, Im just testing the alpha...
that is what i had, but not so great
yes.  natty
for me its fine.
but that coiuld change within a day...   #ubuntu+1 for more natty discussion
